name: NCU Hacker Interface
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Lock Pick" "95577" #L "Nano Programming Interface" "161699" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Lock Pick + Nano Programming Interface = #L "NCU Hacker Interface" "158417" Skills: | BE,NP | ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Fixers tool only.
